mapper.select: select postNo, postTitle, postContent, to_char(p.regDate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') REGDATE, u.id, u.userName from post p, users u, category c where p.cateNo = c.cateNo and c.id = u.id and postNo = #{postNo} and u.id = #{id}

select postNo, postTitle, postContent, to_char(p.regDate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') REGDATE, u.id, u.userName from post p, users u, category c where p.cateNo = c.cateNo and c.id = u.id and postNo = #{postNo} and u.id = #{id}

select postNo, p.cateNo, postTitle, to_char(p.regDate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') regDate from post p, category c, users u where p.cateNo = c.cateNo and c.id = u.id and c.cateNo = #{cateNo} and u.id = #{id} order by p.regDate desc
